entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 p.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 6.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries or rain showers beginning overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
